claim: It is hard to get a BLT in Casablanca.

supporting.text: BLTs are not a traditional dish in Moroccan cuisine, making them less commonly available in Casablanca.

attacks.text: BLTs are not a traditional dish in Moroccan cuisine, making them less commonly available in Casablanca.
Many international restaurants and hotels in Casablanca serve Western dishes like BLTs to cater to tourists and expatriates.
Even in international restaurants, BLTs may not be consistently available due to ingredient sourcing challenges for bacon and other non-traditional items.
Moroccan cuisine is highly adaptable, and some local eateries may offer BLT-inspired dishes using halal substitutes.
Halal substitutes for bacon may not replicate the authentic BLT experience, making it still hard to get a traditional BLT.

supporting.text: Casablanca has a growing number of international restaurants, some of which may serve BLTs.

attacks.text: Casablanca has a growing number of international restaurants, some of which may serve BLTs.
Many international restaurants in Casablanca focus on local or non-Western cuisines, reducing the likelihood of BLTs being available.
Even if international restaurants serve Western dishes, BLTs are not a common menu item due to cultural preferences.
Tourist-heavy areas in Casablanca often cater to Western tastes, increasing the chances of finding a BLT.
Tourist areas may still prioritize local or Mediterranean dishes over American-style sandwiches like BLTs.

supporting.text: Ingredients for a BLT, such as bacon, may be difficult to source in Casablanca due to dietary restrictions.

attacks.text: Ingredients for a BLT, such as bacon, may be difficult to source in Casablanca due to dietary restrictions.
Many international grocery stores in Casablanca stock bacon and other non-halal ingredients for expatriates and tourists.
Even in international stores, bacon is often expensive and limited in supply, making it hard to consistently obtain.
Some restaurants in Casablanca offer BLTs using turkey bacon or other substitutes, making the dish accessible.
Substitutes like turkey bacon significantly alter the traditional BLT's flavor and may not satisfy those seeking an authentic experience.

supporting.text: Tourist areas in Casablanca may cater to Western tastes, increasing the likelihood of finding a BLT.

attacks.text: Tourist areas in Casablanca may cater to Western tastes, increasing the likelihood of finding a BLT.
Casablanca's culinary scene is predominantly Moroccan, and Western-style sandwiches like BLTs are rare even in tourist areas.
Some high-end hotels and international restaurants in Casablanca do serve BLTs to cater to foreign visitors.
Even in high-end establishments, BLTs may not be consistently available due to ingredient sourcing challenges.

supporting.text: Local preferences for traditional Moroccan food may limit the demand for BLTs, reducing their availability.

attacks.text: Local preferences for traditional Moroccan food may limit the demand for BLTs, reducing their availability.
Casablanca has a significant expatriate and tourist population that creates demand for Western foods like BLTs.
Many restaurants in Casablanca cater to international tastes, including serving BLTs, to attract diverse customers.
Even with local preferences, globalization has made Western foods like BLTs widely available in major cities like Casablanca.
Supply chain limitations may still make ingredients for BLTs less accessible compared to traditional Moroccan ingredients.

supporting.text: Some high-end hotels or expat-focused eateries in Casablanca might offer BLTs on their menus.

attacks.text: Some high-end hotels or expat-focused eateries in Casablanca might offer BLTs on their menus.
High-end hotels and expat-focused eateries represent a very small fraction of dining options in Casablanca.
Even in high-end establishments, BLTs may not be consistently available due to ingredient sourcing challenges.
Traditional Moroccan cuisine dominates the food culture, making Western sandwiches like BLTs rare.
Tourist demand has increased the availability of Western dishes in major cities like Casablanca.
